subject: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
full_text:
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

  File        : /Kristin's Files/YOUR OWN EXPERIENCE WILL BE SPECIAL.wav 
  Uploaded by : nitsirk65 <ckmorris95@...> 
  Description : I had just turned up my ListenUp mic (which I call my ears) to hear better and I received this message about my experience.  I don't think it means "Im special" but my experience is 'unique' as is everyone's. 

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Kristin%27s%20Files/YOUR%20OWN%20EXPERIENCE%20WILL%20BE%20SPECIAL.wav 

To learn more about file sharing for your group, please visit:
http://help.yahoo.com/l/us/yahoo/groups/original/members/web/index.htmlfiles

Regards,

nitsirk65 <ckmorris95@...>
